name: Infrastructure as Code
description: We will spend a lot more time on Infrastructure as Code and other DevOps practices later as all of our labs use them. For now, you need to familiarize yourself with a few Terraform concepts.

learning_steps.title: What is IaC
learning_steps.description: Learn the fundamentals of Infrastructure as Code and why it's important.

learning_steps.text: Study: What is Infrastructure as Code with Terraform?
learning_steps.title: What is Infrastructure as Code with Terraform?
Terraform init
learning_steps.description: Learn what terraform init does and why it's the first command you run.

learning_steps.title: Terraform apply
learning_steps.description: Learn how terraform apply creates and updates infrastructure.

learning_steps.text: Test your understanding with an AI assistant
learning_steps.action: Test your understanding with an AI assistant:
learning_steps.description: Remember: The goal is for AI to challenge your understanding, not give you the answer. Use this prompt to verify you understand IaC concepts:
learning_steps.code: I'm studying cloud engineering and recently learned about Infrastructure as Code. I will provide you an explanation about it and please ask me any questions if my explanation is not clear. I want to make sure I really understand this concept so please do not correct me, simply ask questions until I get the explanation right. Here is my explanation: IaC is...

learning_steps.title: Install Terraform
learning_steps.description: Windows users: Make sure you're installing Terraform inside Ubuntu via WSL.

questions.prompt: How would you explain Infrastructure as Code to a manager, and what problems does it solve over manual configuration?
scenario_seeds: Your team manually configured a production server and now no one remembers exactly how to recreate it for disaster recovery
An auditor asks how you can prove that development, staging, and production environments are configured identically
A new cloud region needs the same 30-service architecture you built manually over 6 months in another region
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain IaC as defining infrastructure in code files AND describe benefits of repeatability/consistency AND contrast with manual 'ClickOps' configuration problems.

questions.prompt: Walk me through what terraform init and terraform apply do when you run them.
scenario_seeds: You just cloned a teammate's Terraform repo and need to set it up on your machine before you can deploy anything
A junior engineer ran terraform apply without understanding what would happen and wants to know what they just did
Your Terraform plan shows changes but you need to explain to the team what happens when you run apply
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain init downloads providers/plugins and configures backend AND explain apply reads configuration, shows plan, and creates/updates resources AND mention state file tracking.

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what Infrastructure as Code is and why it's better than manual setup?
Can you quiz me on what terraform init and terraform apply do?
Can you ask me what a Terraform state file is used for?
